title: You were the United States. The Congressman brutally beat up a 19th-century senator?
subtitle: After Nancy Belusi, President of the United States House of Representatives, ripped apart President Donald Trump's speech about the Union, a journalist called him "the greatest ungraded act in Congress." Others objected.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In 1856, the President of the United States House of Representatives (Preston Brooks) brutally attacked the C.C. (Charles Sumner) with a stick in the United States Senate.
